name: Rotate 'N' Shoot (Windows Version)
description:
Since the Web Build of my entry for the Kenney Jam doesn't seem to work and I can't upload new files to the entry here the Windows build of the game!

My Entry to the Kenney Jam 2021! 

The Jam's t

heme was: Rotation

I had a little spare time and really wanted to make a small game again, so I thought why not? :D 

I hope you enjoy it!
